name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Admix - A Mix of the Best AI Models and Tools in One Place

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access to Top AI Models and AI Tools in One Subscription

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of juggling multiple extensions, while trying to keep up with the latest AI advancements? Admix consolidates top AI Models and AI-powered capabilities into a single, seamless extension that will bring AI into all parts of your work. 
 
Forget the hassle of managing a cluttered browser –  Admix got it all in one place. 

      ✅ AI Playground: Pit your favorite AI models against each other, comparing their responses 
           in real-time to find the most insightful and accurate answers. 
      ✅ Prompt Library: Create and save custom prompts for reuse, anytime.
      ✅ Quick Prompt Access: Just hit "/" to pull up your saved prompts in a jiffy.
      ✅ Real-Time Web Access: Get the latest info, right when you need it.
      ✅ AI Everywhere: Integrate your preferred AI model into every text box online! Seamlessly 
           write tweets, perfect emails, fix coding bugs, and more, all without switching tabs.
      ✅ Video Companion: Seamlessly chat with YouTube videos as you watch. Get video 
           summaries, ask questions, and receive detailed explanations instantly.
      ✅  Side by Side: With AI Side Panel, you can pull up any AI Model on any tab without having 
            to toggle between tabs. 

Say goodbye to all your extensions and hello to Admix – your all-in-one browser companion.
